option.name: originalContent
option.value:
version: "3.9" services: service-discovery: build: ./service-discovery ports: - "8761:8761"
api-gateway: build: ./api-gateway ports: - "8080:8080" depends_on: - service-discovery
user-service: build: ./user-service depends_on: - service-discovery
restaurant-service: build: ./restaurant-service depends_on: - service-discovery
order-service: build: ./order-service depends_on: - service-discovery
payment-service: build: ./payment-service depends_on: - service-discovery
notification-service: build: ./notification-service depends_on: - service-discovery

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
services: service-discovery: build: ./service-discovery ports: - "8761:8761"
api-gateway: build: ./api-gateway ports: - "8080:8080" depends_on: - service-discovery
user-service: build: ./user-service depends_on: - service-discovery
restaurant-service: build: ./restaurant-service depends_on: - service-discovery
order-service: build: ./order-service depends_on: - service-discovery
payment-service: build: ./payment-service depends_on: - service-discovery
notification-service: build: ./notification-service depends_on: - service-discovery

option.name: originalContent
option.value: FROM eclipse-temurin:17-jdk-alpine VOLUME /tmp ARG JAR_FILE=target/*.jar COPY ${JAR_FILE} app.jar ENTRYPOINT ["java","-jar","/app.jar"]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: FROM eclipse-temurin:17-jdk VOLUME /tmp ARG JAR_FILE=target/*.jar COPY ${JAR_FILE} app.jar ENTRYPOINT ["java","-jar","/app.jar"]
